00066     public static void main(String args[]) throws CommandLineParsingException, IOException {
00067         String shouldRunProperty = System.getProperty(Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY);
00068         if (shouldRunProperty != null && !Boolean.valueOf(shouldRunProperty)) {
00069             System.out.println("LiquiBase did not run because '" + Liquibase.SHOULD_RUN_SYSTEM_PROPERTY + "' system property was set to false");
00070             return;
00071         }
00072 
00073         Main main = new Main();
00074         if (args.length == 1 && "--help".equals(args[0])) {
00075             main.printHelp(System.out);
00076             return;
00077         } else if (args.length == 1 && "--version".equals(args[0])) {
00078             System.out.println("LiquiBase Version: " + LiquibaseUtil.getBuildVersion() + StreamUtil.getLineSeparator());
00079             return;
00080         }
00081 
00082         main.parseOptions(args);
00083 
00084         File propertiesFile = new File(main.defaultsFile);
00085 
00086         if (propertiesFile.exists()) {
00087             main.parsePropertiesFile(new FileInputStream(propertiesFile));
00088         }
00089         List<String> setupMessages = main.checkSetup();
00090         if (setupMessages.size() > 0) {
00091             main.printHelp(setupMessages, System.out);
00092             return;
00093         }
00094 
00095         try {
00096             main.applyDefaults();
00097             main.configureClassLoader();
00098             main.doMigration();
00099         } catch (Throwable e) {
00100             String message = e.getMessage();
00101             if (e.getCause() != null) {
00102                 message = e.getCause().getMessage();
00103             }
00104             if (message == null) {
00105                 message = "Unknown Reason";
00106             }
00107 
00108             if (e.getCause() instanceof ValidationFailedException) {
00109                 ((ValidationFailedException) e.getCause()).printDescriptiveError(System.out);
00110             } else {
00111                 System.out.println("Migration Failed: " + message + generateLogLevelWarningMessage());
00112                 LogFactory.getLogger().log(Level.SEVERE, message, e);
00113             }
00114             return;
00115         }
00116 
00117         if ("update".equals(main.command)) {
00118             System.out.println("Migration successful");
00119         } else if (main.command.startsWith("rollback") && !main.command.endsWith("SQL")) {
00120             System.out.println("Rollback successful");
00121         }
00122     }
00123 
00124     private static String generateLogLevelWarningMessage() {
00125         Logger logger = LogFactory.getLogger();
00126         if (logger == null || logger.getLevel() == null || (logger.getLevel().equals(Level.OFF))) {
00127             return "";
00128         } else {
00129             return ".  For more information, use the --logLevel flag)";
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00136     protected String[] fixupArgs(String[] args) {
00137         List<String> fixedArgs = new ArrayList<String>();
00138 
00139         for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
00140             String arg = args[i];
00141             if (arg.startsWith("--") && !arg.contains("=")) {
00142                 String nextArg = null;
00143                 if (i + 1 < args.length) {
00144                     nextArg = args[i + 1];
00145                 }
00146                 if (nextArg != null && !nextArg.startsWith("--") && !isCommand(nextArg)) {
00147                     arg = arg + "=" + nextArg;
00148                     i++;
00149                 }
00150             }
00151             fixedArgs.add(arg);
00152         }
00153 
00154         return fixedArgs.toArray(new String[fixedArgs.size()]);
00155     }
00156 
00157     protected List<String> checkSetup() {
00158         List<String> messages = new ArrayList<String>();
00159         if (command == null) {
00160             messages.add("Command not passed");
00161         } else if (!isCommand(command)) {
00162             messages.add("Unknown command: " + command);
00163         } else {
00164             if (username == null) {
00165                 messages.add("--username is required");
00166             }
00167             if (url == null) {
00168                 messages.add("--url is required");
00169             }
00170 
00171             if (isChangeLogRequired(command) && changeLogFile == null) {
00172                 messages.add("--changeLog is required");
00173             }
00174         }
00175         return messages;
00176     }
00177 
00178     private boolean isChangeLogRequired(String command) {
00179         return command.toLowerCase().startsWith("update")
00180                 || command.toLowerCase().startsWith("rollback")
00181                 || "validate".equals(command);
00182     }
00183 
00184     private boolean isCommand(String arg) {
00185         return "migrate".equals(arg)
00186                 || "migrateSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00187                 || "update".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00188                 || "updateSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00189                 || "updateCount".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00190                 || "updateCountSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00191                 || "rollback".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00192                 || "rollbackToDate".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00193                 || "rollbackCount".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00194                 || "rollbackSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00195                 || "rollbackToDateSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00196                 || "rollbackCountSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00197                 || "futureRollbackSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00198                 || "tag".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00199                 || "listLocks".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00200                 || "dropAll".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00201                 || "releaseLocks".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00202                 || "status".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00203                 || "validate".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00204                 || "help".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00205                 || "diff".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00206                 || "diffChangeLog".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00207                 || "generateChangeLog".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00208                 || "clearCheckSums".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00209                 || "dbDoc".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00210                 || "changelogSync".equalsIgnoreCase(arg)
00211                 || "changelogSyncSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(arg);
00212     }

00214     protected void parsePropertiesFile(InputStream propertiesInputStream) throws IOException, CommandLineParsingException {
00215         Properties props = new Properties();
00216         props.load(propertiesInputStream);
00217 
00218         for (Map.Entry entry : props.entrySet()) {
00219             try {
00220                 Field field = getClass().getDeclaredField((String) entry.getKey());
00221                 Object currentValue = field.get(this);
00222 
00223                 if (currentValue == null) {
00224                     String value = entry.getValue().toString().trim();
00225                     if (field.getType().equals(Boolean.class)) {
00226                         field.set(this, Boolean.valueOf(value));
00227                     } else {
00228                         field.set(this, value);
00229                     }
00230                 }
00231             } catch (Exception e) {
00232                 throw new CommandLineParsingException("Unknown parameter: '" + entry.getKey() + "'");
00233             }
00234         }
00235     }

00237     protected void printHelp(List<String> errorMessages, PrintStream stream) {
00238         stream.println("Errors:");
00239         for (String message : errorMessages) {
00240             stream.println("  " + message);
00241         }
00242         stream.println();
00243         printHelp(stream);
00244     }

00246     protected void printHelp(PrintStream stream) {
00247         stream.println("Usage: java -jar liquibase.jar [options] [command]");
00248         stream.println("");
00249         stream.println("Standard Commands:");
00250         stream.println(" update                         Updates database to current version");
00251         stream.println(" updateSQL                      Writes SQL to update database to current");
00252         stream.println("                                version to STDOUT");
00253         stream.println(" updateCount <num>              Applies next NUM changes to the database");
00254         stream.println(" updateSQL <num>                Writes SQL to apply next NUM changes");
00255         stream.println("                                to the database");
00256         stream.println(" rollback <tag>                 Rolls back the database to the the state is was");
00257         stream.println("                                when the tag was applied");
00258         stream.println(" rollbackSQL <tag>              Writes SQL to roll back the database to that");
00259         stream.println("                                state it was in when the tag was applied");
00260         stream.println("                                to STDOUT");
00261         stream.println(" rollbackToDate <date/time>     Rolls back the database to the the state is was");
00262         stream.println("                                at the given date/time.");
00263         stream.println("                                Date Format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
00264         stream.println(" rollbackToDateSQL <date/time>  Writes SQL to roll back the database to that");
00265         stream.println("                                state it was in at the given date/time version");
00266         stream.println("                                to STDOUT");
00267         stream.println(" rollbackCount <value>          Rolls back the last <value> change sets");
00268         stream.println("                                applied to the database");
00269         stream.println(" rollbackCountSQL <value>       Writes SQL to roll back the last");
00270         stream.println("                                <value> change sets to STDOUT");
00271         stream.println("                                applied to the database");
00272         stream.println(" futureRollbackSQL              Writes SQL to roll back the database to the ");
00273         stream.println("                                current state after the changes in the ");
00274         stream.println("                                changeslog have been applied");
00275         stream.println(" generateChangeLog              Writes Change Log XML to copy the current state");
00276         stream.println("                                of the database to standard out");
00277         stream.println("");
00278         stream.println("Diff Commands");
00279         stream.println(" diff [diff parameters]          Writes description of differences");
00280         stream.println("                                 to standard out");
00281         stream.println(" diffChangeLog [diff parameters] Writes Change Log XML to update");
00282         stream.println("                                 the base database");
00283         stream.println("                                 to the target database to standard out");
00284         stream.println("");
00285         stream.println("Documentation Commands");
00286         stream.println(" dbDoc <outputDirectory>         Generates Javadoc-like documentation");
00287         stream.println("                                 based on current database and change log");
00288         stream.println("");
00289         stream.println("Maintenance Commands");
00290         stream.println(" tag <tag string>          'Tags' the current database state for future rollback");
00291         stream.println(" status [--verbose]        Outputs count (list if --verbose) of unrun changesets");
00292         stream.println(" validate                  Checks changelog for errors");
00293         stream.println(" clearCheckSums            Removes all saved checksums from database log.");
00294         stream.println("                           Useful for 'MD5Sum Check Failed' errors");
00295         stream.println(" changelogSync             Mark all changes as executed in the database");
00296         stream.println(" changelogSyncSQL          Writes SQL to mark all changes as executed ");
00297         stream.println("                           in the database to STDOUT");
00298         stream.println(" listLocks                 Lists who currently has locks on the");
00299         stream.println("                           database changelog");
00300         stream.println(" releaseLocks              Releases all locks on the database changelog");
00301         stream.println(" dropAll                   Drop all database objects owned by user");
00302         stream.println("");
00303         stream.println("Required Parameters:");
00304         stream.println(" --changeLogFile=<path and filename>        Migration file");
00305         stream.println(" --username=<value>                         Database username");
00306         stream.println(" --password=<value>                         Database password");
00307         stream.println(" --url=<value>                              Database URL");
00308         stream.println("");
00309         stream.println("Optional Parameters:");
00310         stream.println(" --classpath=<value>                        Classpath containing");
00311         stream.println("                                            migration files and JDBC Driver");
00312         stream.println(" --driver=<jdbc.driver.ClassName>           Database driver class name");
00313         stream.println(" --databaseClass=<database.ClassName>       custom liquibase.database.Database");
00314         stream.println("                                            implementation to use");
00315         stream.println(" --defaultSchemaName=<name>                 Default database schema to use");
00316         stream.println(" --contexts=<value>                         ChangeSet contexts to execute");
00317         stream.println(" --defaultsFile=</path/to/file.properties>  File with default option values");
00318         stream.println("                                            (default: ./liquibase.properties)");
00319         stream.println(" --includeSystemClasspath=<true|false>      Include the system classpath");
00320         stream.println("                                            in the LiquiBase classpath");
00321         stream.println("                                            (default: true)");
00322         stream.println(" --promptForNonLocalDatabase=<true|false>   Prompt if non-localhost");
00323         stream.println("                                            databases (default: false)");
00324         stream.println(" --logLevel=<level>                         Execution log level");
00325         stream.println("                                            (finest, finer, fine, info,");
00326         stream.println("                                            warning, severe)");
00327         stream.println(" --currentDateTimeFunction=<value>          Overrides current date time function");
00328         stream.println("                                            used in SQL.");
00329         stream.println("                                            Useful for unsupported databases");
00330         stream.println(" --help                                     Prints this message");
00331         stream.println(" --version                                  Prints this version information");
00332         stream.println("");
00333         stream.println("Required Diff Parameters:");
00334         stream.println(" --baseUsername=<value>                     Base Database username");
00335         stream.println(" --basePassword=<value>                     Base Database password");
00336         stream.println(" --baseUrl=<value>                          Base Database URL");
00337         stream.println("");
00338         stream.println("Optional Diff Parameters:");
00339         stream.println(" --baseDriver=<jdbc.driver.ClassName>       Base Database driver class name");
00340         stream.println("");
00341         stream.println("Default value for parameters can be stored in a file called");
00342         stream.println("'liquibase.properties' that is read from the current working directory.");
00343         stream.println("");
00344         stream.println("Full documentation is available at");
00345         stream.println("http://www.liquibase.org/manual/command_line");
00346         stream.println("");
00347     }

00349     public Main() {

00352 
00353     protected void parseOptions(String[] args) throws CommandLineParsingException {
00354         args = fixupArgs(args);
00355 
00356         boolean seenCommand = false;
00357         for (String arg : args) {
00358             if (isCommand(arg)) {
00359                 this.command = arg;
00360                 if (this.command.equalsIgnoreCase("migrate")) {
00361                     this.command = "update";
00362                 } else if (this.command.equalsIgnoreCase("migrateSQL")) {
00363                     this.command = "updateSQL";
00364                 }
00365                 seenCommand = true;
00366             } else if (seenCommand) {
00367                 commandParams.add(arg);
00368             } else if (arg.startsWith("--")) {
00369                 String[] splitArg = splitArg(arg);
00370 
00371                 String attributeName = splitArg[0];
00372                 String value = splitArg[1];
00373 
00374                 try {
00375                     Field field = getClass().getDeclaredField(attributeName);
00376                     if (field.getType().equals(Boolean.class)) {
00377                         field.set(this, Boolean.valueOf(value));
00378                     } else {
00379                         field.set(this, value);
00380                     }
00381                 } catch (Exception e) {
00382                     throw new CommandLineParsingException("Unknown parameter: '" + attributeName + "'");
00383                 }
00384             } else {
00385                 throw new CommandLineParsingException("Parameters must start with a '--'");
00386             }
00387         }
00388 
00389     }
00390 
00391     private String[] splitArg(String arg) throws CommandLineParsingException {
00392         String[] splitArg = arg.split("=");
00393         if (splitArg.length < 2) {
00394             throw new CommandLineParsingException("Could not parse '" + arg + "'");
00395         } else if (splitArg.length > 2) {
00396             StringBuffer secondHalf = new StringBuffer();
00397             for (int j = 1; j < splitArg.length; j++) {
00398                 secondHalf.append(splitArg[j]).append("=");
00399             }
00400 
00401             splitArg = new String[]{
00402                     splitArg[0],
00403                     secondHalf.toString().replaceFirst("=$", "")
00404             };
00405         }
00406 
00407         splitArg[0] = splitArg[0].replaceFirst("--", "");
00408         return splitArg;
00409     }
00410 
00411     protected void applyDefaults() {
00412         if (this.promptForNonLocalDatabase == null) {
00413             this.promptForNonLocalDatabase = Boolean.FALSE;
00414         }
00415         if (this.logLevel == null) {
00416             this.logLevel = "off";
00417         }
00418         if (this.includeSystemClasspath == null) {
00419             this.includeSystemClasspath = Boolean.TRUE;
00420         }
00421 
00422     }
00423 
00424     protected void configureClassLoader() throws CommandLineParsingException {
00425         final List<URL> urls = new ArrayList<URL>();
00426         if (this.classpath != null) {
00427             String[] classpath;
00428             if (isWindows()) {
00429                 classpath = this.classpath.split(";");
00430             } else {
00431                 classpath = this.classpath.split(":");
00432             }
00433 
00434             for (String classpathEntry : classpath) {
00435                 File classPathFile = new File(classpathEntry);
00436                 if (!classPathFile.exists()) {
00437                     throw new CommandLineParsingException(classPathFile.getAbsolutePath() + " does not exist");
00438                 }
00439                 try {
00440                     if (classpathEntry.endsWith(".war")) {
00441                         addWarFileClasspathEntries(classPathFile, urls);
00442                     } else if (classpathEntry.endsWith(".ear")) {
00443                         JarFile earZip = new JarFile(classPathFile);
00444 
00445                         Enumeration<? extends JarEntry> entries = earZip.entries();
00446                         while (entries.hasMoreElements()) {
00447                             JarEntry entry = entries.nextElement();
00448                             if (entry.getName().toLowerCase().endsWith(".jar")) {
00449                                 File jar = extract(earZip, entry);
00450                                 urls.add(new URL("jar:" + jar.toURL() + "!/"));
00451                                 jar.deleteOnExit();
00452                             } else if (entry.getName().toLowerCase().endsWith("war")) {
00453                                 File warFile = extract(earZip, entry);
00454                                 addWarFileClasspathEntries(warFile, urls);
00455                             }
00456                         }
00457 
00458                     } else {
00459                         urls.add(new File(classpathEntry).toURL());
00460                     }
00461                 } catch (Exception e) {
00462                     throw new CommandLineParsingException(e);
00463                 }
00464             }
00465         }
00466         if (includeSystemClasspath) {
00467             classLoader = AccessController.doPrivileged(new PrivilegedAction<URLClassLoader>() {
00468                 public URLClassLoader run() {
00469                     return new URLClassLoader(urls.toArray(new URL[urls.size()]), Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader());
00470                 }
00471             });
00472 
00473         } else {
00474             classLoader = AccessController.doPrivileged(new PrivilegedAction<URLClassLoader>() {
00475                 public URLClassLoader run() {
00476                     return new URLClassLoader(urls.toArray(new URL[urls.size()]));
00477                 }
00478             });
00479         }
00480     }
00481 
00482     private void addWarFileClasspathEntries(File classPathFile, List<URL> urls) throws IOException {
00483         URL url = new URL("jar:" + classPathFile.toURL() + "!/WEB-INF/classes/");
00484         urls.add(url);
00485         JarFile warZip = new JarFile(classPathFile);
00486         Enumeration<? extends JarEntry> entries = warZip.entries();
00487         while (entries.hasMoreElements()) {
00488             JarEntry entry = entries.nextElement();
00489             if (entry.getName().startsWith("WEB-INF/lib")
00490                     && entry.getName().toLowerCase().endsWith(".jar")) {
00491                 File jar = extract(warZip, entry);
00492                 urls.add(new URL("jar:" + jar.toURL() + "!/"));
00493                 jar.deleteOnExit();
00494             }
00495         }
00496     }
00497 
00498 
00499     private File extract(JarFile jar, JarEntry entry) throws IOException {
00500         // expand to temp dir and add to list
00501         File tempFile = File.createTempFile("liquibase.tmp", null);
00502         // read from jar and write to the tempJar file
00503         BufferedInputStream inStream = null;
00504 
00505         BufferedOutputStream outStream = null;
00506         try {
00507             inStream = new BufferedInputStream(jar.getInputStream(entry));
00508             outStream = new BufferedOutputStream(
00509                     new FileOutputStream(tempFile));
00510             int status;
00511             while ((status = inStream.read()) != -1) {
00512                 outStream.write(status);
00513             }
00514         } finally {
00515             if (outStream != null) {
00516                 try {
00517                     outStream.close();
00518                 } catch (IOException ioe) {
00519                     ;
00520                 }
00521             }
00522             if (inStream != null) {
00523                 try {
00524                     inStream.close();
00525                 } catch (IOException ioe) {
00526                     ;
00527                 }
00528             }
00529         }
00530 
00531         return tempFile;
00532     }
00533 
00534     protected void doMigration() throws Exception {
00535         if ("help".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00536             printHelp(System.out);
00537             return;
00538         }
00539 
00540         if ("finest".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00541             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINEST);
00542         } else if ("finer".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00543             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINER);
00544         } else if ("fine".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00545             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.FINE);
00546         } else if ("info".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00547             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.INFO);
00548         } else if ("warning".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00549             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.WARNING);
00550         } else if ("severe".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00551             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.SEVERE);
00552         } else if ("off".equalsIgnoreCase(logLevel)) {
00553             LogFactory.getLogger().setLevel(Level.OFF);
00554         } else {
00555             throw new CommandLineParsingException("Unknown log level: " + logLevel);
00556         }
00557 
00558         FileSystemFileOpener fsOpener = new FileSystemFileOpener();
00559         CommandLineFileOpener clOpener = new CommandLineFileOpener(classLoader);
00560         Driver driver;
00561         DatabaseFactory databaseFactory = DatabaseFactory.getInstance();
00562         if (this.databaseClass != null) {
00563             databaseFactory.addDatabaseImplementation((Database) Class.forName(this.databaseClass, true, classLoader).newInstance());
00564         }
00565 
00566         try {
00567             if (this.driver == null) {
00568                 this.driver = databaseFactory.findDefaultDriver(url);
00569             }
00570 
00571             if (this.driver == null) {
00572                 throw new RuntimeException("Driver class was not specified and could not be determined from the url");
00573             }
00574 
00575             driver = (Driver) Class.forName(this.driver, true, classLoader).newInstance();
00576         } catch (Exception e) {
00577             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot find database driver: " + e.getMessage());
00578         }
00579         Properties info = new Properties();
00580         info.put("user", username);
00581         if (password != null) {
00582             info.put("password", password);
00583         }
00584 
00585         Connection connection = driver.connect(url, info);
00586         if (connection == null) {
00587             throw new JDBCException("Connection could not be created to " + url + " with driver " + driver.getClass().getName() + ".  Possibly the wrong driver for the given database URL");
00588         }
00589 
00590         try {
00591             Database database = databaseFactory.findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection);
00592             database.setDefaultSchemaName(StringUtils.trimToNull(defaultSchemaName));
00593 
00594 
00595             if ("diff".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00596                 doDiff(database, createDatabaseFromCommandParams(commandParams));
00597                 return;
00598             } else if ("diffChangeLog".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00599                 doDiffToChangeLog(database, createDatabaseFromCommandParams(commandParams));
00600                 return;
00601             } else if ("generateChangeLog".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00602                 doGenerateChangeLog(database);
00603                 return;
00604             }
00605 
00606 
00607             Liquibase liquibase = new Liquibase(changeLogFile, new CompositeFileOpener(fsOpener, clOpener), database);
00608 
00609             if ("listLocks".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00610                 liquibase.reportLocks(System.out);
00611                 return;
00612             } else if ("releaseLocks".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00613                 LockHandler.getInstance(database).forceReleaseLock();
00614                 System.out.println("Successfully released all database change log locks for " + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00615                 return;
00616             } else if ("tag".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00617                 liquibase.tag(commandParams.iterator().next());
00618                 System.out.println("Successfully tagged " + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00619                 return;
00620             } else if ("dropAll".equals(command)) {
00621                 liquibase.dropAll();
00622                 System.out.println("All objects dropped from " + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionUsername() + "@" + liquibase.getDatabase().getConnectionURL());
00623                 return;
00624             } else if ("status".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00625                 boolean runVerbose = false;
00626 
00627                 if (commandParams.contains("--verbose")) {
00628                     runVerbose = true;
00629                 }
00630                 liquibase.reportStatus(runVerbose, contexts, getOutputWriter());
00631                 return;
00632             } else if ("validate".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00633                 try {
00634                     liquibase.validate();
00635                 } catch (ValidationFailedException e) {
00636                     e.printDescriptiveError(System.out);
00637                     return;
00638                 }
00639                 System.out.println("No validation errors found");
00640                 return;
00641             } else if ("clearCheckSums".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00642                 liquibase.clearCheckSums();
00643                 return;
00644             } else if ("dbdoc".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00645                 if (commandParams.size() == 0) {
00646                     throw new CommandLineParsingException("dbdoc requires an output directory");
00647                 }
00648                 if (changeLogFile == null) {
00649                     throw new CommandLineParsingException("dbdoc requires a changeLog parameter");
00650                 }
00651                 liquibase.generateDocumentation(commandParams.iterator().next());
00652                 return;
00653             }
00654 
00655             DateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
00656             try {
00657                 if ("update".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00658                     liquibase.update(contexts);
00659                 } else if ("changelogSync".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00660                     liquibase.changeLogSync(contexts);
00661                 } else if ("changelogSyncSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00662                     liquibase.changeLogSync(contexts, getOutputWriter());
00663                 } else if ("updateCount".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00664                     liquibase.update(Integer.parseInt(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts);
00665                 } else if ("updateCountSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00666                     liquibase.update(Integer.parseInt(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts, getOutputWriter());
00667                 } else if ("updateSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00668                     liquibase.update(contexts, getOutputWriter());
00669                 } else if ("rollback".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00670                     if (commandParams == null) {
00671                         throw new CommandLineParsingException("rollback requires a rollback tag");
00672                     }
00673                     liquibase.rollback(commandParams.iterator().next(), contexts);
00674                 } else if ("rollbackToDate".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00675                     if (commandParams == null) {
00676                         throw new CommandLineParsingException("rollback requires a rollback date");
00677                     }
00678                     liquibase.rollback(dateFormat.parse(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts);
00679                 } else if ("rollbackCount".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00680                     liquibase.rollback(Integer.parseInt(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts);
00681 
00682                 } else if ("rollbackSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00683                     if (commandParams == null) {
00684                         throw new CommandLineParsingException("rollbackSQL requires a rollback tag");
00685                     }
00686                     liquibase.rollback(commandParams.iterator().next(), contexts, getOutputWriter());
00687                 } else if ("rollbackToDateSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00688                     if (commandParams == null) {
00689                         throw new CommandLineParsingException("rollbackToDateSQL requires a rollback date");
00690                     }
00691                     liquibase.rollback(dateFormat.parse(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts, getOutputWriter());
00692                 } else if ("rollbackCountSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00693                     if (commandParams == null) {
00694                         throw new CommandLineParsingException("rollbackCountSQL requires a rollback tag");
00695                     }
00696 
00697                     liquibase.rollback(Integer.parseInt(commandParams.iterator().next()), contexts, getOutputWriter());
00698                 } else if ("futureRollbackSQL".equalsIgnoreCase(command)) {
00699                     liquibase.futureRollbackSQL(contexts, getOutputWriter());
00700                 } else {
00701                     throw new CommandLineParsingException("Unknown command: " + command);
00702                 }
00703             } catch (ParseException e) {
00704                 throw new CommandLineParsingException("Unexpected date/time format.  Use 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'");
00705             }
00706         } finally {
00707             try {
00708                 connection.rollback();
00709                 connection.close();
00710             } catch (SQLException e) {
00711                 LogFactory.getLogger().log(Level.WARNING, "problem closing connection", e);
00712             }
00713         }
00714     }
00715 
00716     private Database createDatabaseFromCommandParams(Set<String> commandParams) throws CommandLineParsingException, JDBCException {
00717         String driver = null;
00718         String url = null;
00719         String username = null;
00720         String password = null;
00721         String defaultSchemaName = null;
00722 
00723         for (String param : commandParams) {
00724             String[] splitArg = splitArg(param);
00725 
00726             String attributeName = splitArg[0];
00727             String value = splitArg[1];
00728             if ("baseDriver".equalsIgnoreCase(attributeName)) {
00729                 driver = value;
00730             } else if ("baseUrl".equalsIgnoreCase(attributeName)) {
00731                 url = value;
00732             } else if ("baseUsername".equalsIgnoreCase(attributeName)) {
00733                 username = value;
00734             } else if ("basePassword".equalsIgnoreCase(attributeName)) {
00735                 password = value;
00736             } else if ("baseDefaultSchemaName".equalsIgnoreCase(attributeName)) {
00737                 defaultSchemaName = value;
00738             }
00739         }
00740 
00741         if (driver == null) {
00742             driver = DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findDefaultDriver(url);
00743         }
00744 
00745         Driver driverObject;
00746         try {
00747             driverObject = (Driver) Class.forName(driver, true, classLoader).newInstance();
00748         } catch (Exception e) {
00749             throw new RuntimeException("Cannot find database driver: " + e.getMessage());
00750         }
00751 
00752         Properties info = new Properties();
00753         info.put("user", username);
00754         info.put("password", password);
00755 
00756         Connection connection;
00757         try {
00758             connection = driverObject.connect(url, info);
00759         } catch (SQLException e) {
00760             throw new JDBCException("Connection could not be created to " + url + ": " + e.getMessage(), e);
00761         }
00762         if (connection == null) {
00763             throw new JDBCException("Connection could not be created to " + url + " with driver " + driver.getClass().getName() + ".  Possibly the wrong driver for the given database URL");
00764         }
00765 
00766         Database database = DatabaseFactory.getInstance().findCorrectDatabaseImplementation(connection);
00767         database.setDefaultSchemaName(defaultSchemaName);
00768 
00769         return database;
00770     }
00771 
00772     private Writer getOutputWriter() {
00773         return new OutputStreamWriter(System.out);
00774     }
00775 
00776     public boolean isWindows() {
00777         return System.getProperty("os.name").startsWith("Windows ");
00778     }
00779 
00780     private void doDiff(Database baseDatabase, Database targetDatabase) throws JDBCException {
00781         Diff diff = new Diff(baseDatabase, targetDatabase);
00782         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00783         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00784 
00785         System.out.println("");
00786         System.out.println("Diff Results:");
00787         diffResult.printResult(System.out);
00788     }
00789 
00790     private void doDiffToChangeLog(Database baseDatabase, Database targetDatabase) throws JDBCException, IOException, ParserConfigurationException {
00791         Diff diff = new Diff(baseDatabase, targetDatabase);
00792         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00793         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00794 
00795         diffResult.printChangeLog(System.out, targetDatabase);
00796     }
00797 
00798     private void doGenerateChangeLog(Database originalDatabase) throws JDBCException, IOException, ParserConfigurationException {
00799         Diff diff = new Diff(originalDatabase, defaultSchemaName);
00800         diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00801         DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00802 
00803         PrintStream outputStream = System.out;
00804 
00805         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(changeLogFile) != null) {
00806             File changeFile = new File(changeLogFile);
00807             outputStream = new PrintStream(changeFile);
00808         }
00809         diffResult.printChangeLog(outputStream, originalDatabase);
00810     }
00811 
00812 
00813     private static class OutDiffStatusListener implements DiffStatusListener {
00814         public void statusUpdate(String message) {
00815             System.err.println(message);
00816         }
00817     }
00818 }
